import React from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function ProductScreen(props) { const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails); const { loading, error, product } = productDetails; return (
{loading ? ( ) : error ? ({error} ) : (
Back to Result

  • {product.name}

  • Price: {product.price} CZK
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    {product.price} CZK
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? (In Stock) : ( Unavailable)}
)}
); } export default ProductScreen;
